Text: A human possessed? ...Is that unusual?
It's very...very rare.

All of the possessed who the Garden has discovered or
cured...have all been...elves or therianthropes.

But our lord's elder sister was also a human
possessed...

Indeed. Lady Claire displayed symptoms of possession,
but Master Shadow cured her himself.

In other words...human possession itself is something
highly rare that we, the Shadow Garden, are facing
for the first time.

Exactly. I couldn't decide on my own whether to
rescue her and handle the situation as usual.

...This is certainly an issue that requires careful
consideration.

Is human possession something we can't cure the same
way we can in elves and therianthropes?

To begin with, even the magic circuits amongst elves
and therianthropes are slightly different...

In fact, between curing possessed elves and
therianthropes, there's a definite difference
in sensation with the way magic flows and
is harnessed.

It's hard to explain the difference in detail,
yet elves and therianthropes still share
similar circuitry.

So you're not sure if it's actually possible for me
or Epsilon to cure the human possessed like we
do with elves and therianthropes…

...There's also the additional circumstance where the
Cult of Diablos and the Templars are in a standoff
over this human possessed.

...The Templars have always had a tendency to try
and snatch up the Cult's possessed...

Yes, but this appears to be different regarding
human possessed. It may sound strange to put
it this way, but the Templars are handling this
case with "respect."

The Templars also appear to want to secure
the human possessed at all costs.
...Human possessed are valuable?

Right, when the Cult kidnapped Lady Claire, they
didn't immediately hand her over to the Church,
but instead imprisoned her in their hideout...

...I had wondered at the time why they were taking so
long to act without demanding a ransom...

If the human possessed have some secret or value we
are unaware of, then it all makes sense, Lady Alpha!

...True, you and Beta may be right. The human
possessed may hold some secret!

Still, the race of the possessed doesn't change what
we, in the Shadow Garden, are tasked to do!

That's right! Kill all the Culties and Tempuras!
I'll never stop hunting them down!

This human possessed... I'd like to turn her into a
test subject, even if I get in trouble for it... Heheh!
Hey, whoa, whoa...
You can't do that, Eta.
Even if it were up to you, Beta?
Yes, even if it were up to me!

...The immediate issue we face is that even if we
were to rescue this human possessed from the
hands of the Cult and the Templars...

Will we be able to successfully cure her? This is the
matter at hand—

If we're not sure how to do it, let's get Boss to do
it for us! Boss healed his sister before!

That would certainly be one solution...but I'd hate
to burden Cid, especially if we were to discover
more human possessed in the future—

Then we should learn how to do it from him!
Boss taught me how to train my muscles!

True...you have a point, Delta. If we can't do it
now, then we must learn.

Well then, I'll receive the proper instructions from
Shadow about how to cure the human possessed.
Then, in the meantime, the rest of us will...

Prepare a rescue mission against the Cult of Diablos
and the Templars!

Alright, there's no time to waste. I'll share the
intel I've compiled.
Thanks, Zeta.

...Don't worry about it. We fight for our lord to
destroy the Cult of Diablos...

Even if we're apart...we're still...the Seven
Shadows.
Yes, that's right.

...The possessed is Nicoletta Marquez...daughter of
Marquess Marquez, an aristocrat of Midgar Kingdom.

The Marquez family is one of Midgar's most reputable
aristocratic families, responsible for producing gifted
dark knights.

After obtaining this intel, I tried to dig up any
similar tale centered around a significant noble
Midgar family, but...

I couldn't find anything related to possession.
No doubt they were quickly covered up, leaving
no trace.

How is this Marquess' daughter being handled
officially?

...That she died suddenly from an illness. A fake
funeral was already held two days before I obtained
this intel.
No way!

So, the reaction and response to possession are the
same for the elven and human aristocrats.
The Marquez family... Hmm...
Epsilon?
If I recall...err...
Recall what? Do you have any leads—
Wait, that's it!
Whoa, Gamma?! Don't shout like that!
I remember meeting someone with that name!
What? Where?

Nicoletta Marquez was at a party for the aristocrats!
That was the same party where Epsilon made her debut!

Ahh! That's it! She was one of the attendees!
The apprentice dark knight from the Marquez
family! She really was there!
Then you can produce the documents now?
Of course! I'll prepare them immediately—
Aaagh!
Oh dear... Epsilon, may I ask you instead?
Understood, Lady Alpha!
Nghh... How unladylike...
...*yawn*
Meetings are always a bore...
